name: npm-service-a
description: test project for an npm project A

scripts.count:10: bash -c 'for i in {1..10}; do echo "Project A: $i"; sleep 1; done'
scripts.count:3: bash -c 'for i in {1..3}; do echo "Project A: $i"; sleep 1; done'
scripts.fail:5: bash -c 'for i in {1..5}; do echo "Project A: $i"; sleep 1; done; echo "Failed for test"; exit 1;'
